    • Uses of AuthorizationException in org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql

      Methods in org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql that throw AuthorizationException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void Driver.doAuthorization(HiveOperation op, BaseSemanticAnalyzer sem, String command)
      Do authorization using post semantic analysis information in the semantic analyzer The original command is also passed so that authorization interface can provide more useful information in logs.
